ruleset.name: Apex Naming Rules
ruleset.description: Custom rules for Apex naming conventions

rule.name: InnerClassesMustBeOneWord
rule.message: Inner class names must be a single word. They cannot contain underscores or multiple words in PascalCase
rule.description: Inner class names must be a single word. They cannot contain underscores or multiple words in PascalCase. This naming convention helps distinguish inner classes from regular classes and improves code readability.
